Name: picthor.io

Web UI Port.Name: Web UI Port
Web UI Port.Description: Picthor is listening on port 5000 by default, map it to an available port on your unraid server

Web address.Name: Web address
Web address.Description:
The url of your picthor installation.
Usually: http://<your unraid ip>:<picthor web ui port>

PICTHOR_CACHE_DIR.Name: PICTHOR_CACHE_DIR
PICTHOR_CACHE_DIR.Description: Container path to cache dir. This should match the mapped

Cache path.Name: Cache path
Cache path.Description: This is the place where all the generated thumbs and other cache files will be placed. Fast SSD is preferable.

Root directory path.Name: Root directory path
Root directory path.Description: Root path example where you should mount your photos library folder. Use this path when you will be adding a root dir in the web ui. Read only access mode is recommend.
